name: SSF25
title: Site-Specific Factor 25
subtitle: Schema Discriminator: Melanoma Ciliary Body/Melanoma Iris
notes: **Note:**  For cases coded to melanoma with primary site code C694 Ciliary Body/Iris, code the site in which the tumor arose. This information will be used to determine which of two schemas will be used to assign staging values to the case.

Crystalline lens
